name: CaptionDescriptor
desc: The object used in image components for displaying captions when the image is full-screen.

items.name: text
items.desc: The text to display in the caption, including any formatting tags or markup, depending on the format property.

items.name: additions
items.desc: An array of Link objects that provide additional information for ranges of the caption text in the text property.Additions are ignored when format is set to html or markdown.

items.name: format
items.desc: The formatting or markup method applied to the text. If format is set to html or markdown, neither additons nor InlineTextStyles are supported.

items.name: inlineTextStyles
items.desc: An array of InlineTextStyle objects to be applied to ranges of the captionâ€™s text.InlineTextStyles are ignored when format is set to html or markdown.

items.name: textStyle
items.desc: An inline ComponentTextStyle object that contains styling information, or a string reference to a component text style object that is defined at the top level of the document.
